reviews.text: My partner & I did the 1 hour plane flight over The Whitsundays  & out to Heart Reef - was perfect weather! Our pilot Max made this trip more awesome! What a magical day! We absolutely loved every minute of it!

reviews.text: This was the best thing we did in Airlie. My GF and I went on a flight over heart reef and landed at Whitehaven and went for a swim. To see the reef from above was incredible. Expensive, but worth it.
